official_title: Encouraging State and local governments to deny or otherwise restrict the driving privileges of minors convicted of drug related offenses.

summary.text: Urges State and local governments to: (1) revoke the driver's license of any minor convicted of a drug related offense; and (2) deny any offender under the legal driving age a driver's license for a period beyond the time the offender reaches the recognized legal age.

titles.title: Encouraging State and local governments to deny or otherwise restrict the driving privileges of minors convicted of drug related offenses.
